member.name: T:Trumpf.AutoTest.Facts.AutoTestWithFactsBase
member.summary: AutoTest base class that sends facts to a FactsHub service. The UniqueNameAttribute is used to extract unique names.

member.summary: AutoTest base class that sends facts to a FactsHub service.
member.typeparam: The attribute type used to attach unique names to test methods.
